IF(CMAKE_COMPILER_IS_GNUCC)
    ADD_DEFINITIONS("-Wno-unused-function -Wno-format -Wno-format-security")
ENDIF()

    SSS_APIs
    ex_common
    smCom
)

    INSTALL(TARGETS ${PROJECT_NAME} DESTINATION bin)
ENDIF()
